bättre hitta "Hitman.Contracts.CD2.PROPER-CXZiSO. här är nfo som förklarar varför:

1.DiESEL version requires emulation software for it to run. This is a pain 

in the ass to be frank.This proper runs as your retail copy would with

no 3rd party software needed to emulate it.The game is also blacklisted

to run mounted on Daemon tools and Alcohol 120%. However we believe the game

"will" run mounted once the virtual drive software has been updated and the

blacklists removed.



2.DiESEL version was not freely available as it was by an unknown group.

We hope this proper will be more available to those who require a back up

of their retail copy. We also , as a seperate release ,have released a ccd

version of CD1 of this game as an internal for the reasons stated above.

I was so excited I didn't pay enough attention to the SPECIFIC torrent i took-figured it was this one, as I went to download the torrent a second time to compare the name (BitTorrent, at select opportunities tends to rename the damn thing and conveniently so gave it a vague designation..time to wake up and note that shit BEFOREHAND, I guess-kinda makes it a bitch to give feedback if you don't have an avenue for reply) So I'm 95% sure I've gotten back to the right one....mumbling aside, I had a bit of trouble with this one, at first-but once I extracted all the files with my IsoBuster (V.2.2), and then mounted the CD1 & CD2 in my Daemon "virtual drives" E & F (respectively), Awesome! I've only played a bit on the 1st level so far (just to verify operation), but all the sound(all SFX), graphics, so on ran great! Looks like a sweet job! Well done, man well done! P.S.- You can mount just 1 drive @ a time w/ Daemon, but I had a bit of a "stumble" doing that-still worked out fine, but found it EASIER to mount disc 1 & 2 in their own separate drives-typically E & F (& in ORDER, so pay attention there).

Long story short, this torrent works and looks/sounds awesome-well worth the effort & seems to be quite complete-though I haven't viewed it all, yet....."I want the pink mist"...thought MY family was disfunctional--

For people having the "Please Insert Disc 2" problem, here's how I got over it:
Download the 1.74 patch http://smartdownloads.net/download-22432.html
And then the crack file http://www.freeinfosociety.com/site.php?postnum=1094.
Place the crack file inside the directory where the game was installed (probably program files > eidos > hitman contracts) and REPLACE IT with "hitmancontract.exe". Then just run it and it will work fine!
Also if your framerate is a little crappy just get rid of some of the filters in the graphic options.
Hope I helped.
